sense.name: the activity of aggregating, piling up
sense.examples: His uncle's lifelong goal was the accumulation of a large fortune. Ventilating the boat will prevent an accumulation of gasoline fumes below deck. Each individual's accumulation of knowledge is a personal journey. The nation's continual accumulation of debt worries some economists.

sense.name: an assembled pile of things, an aggregation
sense.examples: Mary was depressed by the accumulation of paperwork sitting on her desk. There is such an accumulation of dust bunnies under this bed! John cleaned out an accumulation of leaves in his gutters.

sense.name: monetary growth based on interest, or profit
sense.examples: The company kept its profits this year as an accumulation, rather than issuing dividends to shareholders. What is the accumulation of the bank's 12-month certificate of deposit?
